name: acs-bluetooth
description: Bluetooth module for connecting to ACS scanner with NativeScript

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.android.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove acs-bluetooth && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns platform add android --sdk 23 && cd ..
